pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Jeanne's $(l:revice/devices/libera_driver)Libera Driver$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Jeanne's $(l:revice/riders/jeanne#cobra)Cobra Genome$(/l)
